Texts.Chs: 干得好，现在有了我们需要的一切材料，我们就可以来酿一瓶酒香四溢的瓦特酒了。
Texts.Eng: Nice. Now we have everything we need to make a delicious wartwine.

Texts.Chs: 好了，请先准备好^orange;葡萄^white;和一个^orange;空桶^white;，再把它们放到^orange;水果压榨机^white;里，最后制作出^green;葡萄醪^white;吧。
Texts.Eng: Use some ^orange;grapes^white; and an ^orange;empty bucket^white; in the ^orange;Wine Press^white; to make ^green;Grape Mash^white;. You'll want two units of it for the wine you'll be making.
